abstracts.cdata!:
This restructuring paper for the Urban
            Water Supply and Sanitation Project in Indonesia involves
            revision and update to the Results Framework and its key
            performance indicators described in the Project Appraisal
            Document (PAD). This will ensure that a more efficient set
            of indicators are applied during project implementation and
            they are consistently presented in the Performance
            Agreements between Local Governments and their respective
            PDAMs. The project is currently rated as Satisfactory
            towards achievement of its Project Development Objectives
            and overall Implementation Progress is rated as Moderately
            Satisfactory. The proposed changes to be included in this
            restructuring include: (i) revision and update of the
            Results Framework (description and definition of Key
            Performance Indicators to include core indicator and to
            ensure consistency between all project documents); and (ii)
            to correct and update baseline data and targets.
